#summary Download binary and source distributions
#sidebar SideBarPage

The current version of the code is "alpha 1". It has not been not heavily tested but should be usable.

Here are the download links:
  * the [http://gwtphprpc.googlecode.com/files/phprpcgen_bin_alpha1.zip binary distribution]
  * the [http://gwtphprpc.googlecode.com/files/phprpcgen_src_alpha1.zip source distribution] (actually an export of an eclipse project, can be built with ANT)

Here is also the full [http://gwtphprpc.googlecode.com/files/TutorialCodeEclipseProject.zip code of the tutorial].
